languages.text: Пока чернь гнет спины в полумраке нижних отсеков, офицеры и высокопоставленные слуги Вольного Торговца пользуются многочисленными благами верхних палуб. Лучшая еда, чистая вода и качественные медикаменты достаются верхушке флагмана.

traits.locale_text: Пока чернь гнет спины в полумраке нижних отсеков, офицеры и высокопоставленные слуги Вольного Торговца пользуются многочисленными благами верхних палуб. Лучшая еда, чистая вода и качественные медикаменты достаются верхушке флагмана.

languages.text: For the underclasses, there is nothing but back-breaking labour in the gloom of the lower decks; meanwhile, the Rogue Trader's officers and high-ranking servants enjoy the many luxuries the upper decks offer. The flagship's higher-ups receive the best food, clean water, and quality medicine.
languages.original_text: Пока чернь гнет спины в полумраке нижних отсеков, офицеры и высокопоставленные слуги Вольного Торговца пользуются многочисленными благами верхних палуб. Лучшая еда, чистая вода и качественные медикаменты достаются верхушке флагмана.

traits.locale_text: For the underclasses, there is nothing but back-breaking labour in the gloom of the lower decks; meanwhile, the Rogue Trader's officers and high-ranking servants enjoy the many comforts upper decks offer. The flagship's higher-ups get the best food, clean water, and quality medicine.

For the underclasses, there is nothing but back-breaking labour in the gloom of the lower decks; meanwhile, the Rogue Trader's officers and high-ranking servants enjoy the many luxuries the upper decks offer. The flagship's higher-ups receive the best food, clean water, and quality medicine.

languages.text: Para las clases bajas, la penumbra de las cubiertas inferiores no contiene más que trabajo extenuante, mientras que los oficiales y sirvientes de alto rango de todo Comerciante Independiente disfrutan de los lujos de las cubiertas superiores. El alto mando de la nave insignia recibe la mejor comida, agua limpia y medicina de calidad.
languages.original_text: For the underclasses, there is nothing but back-breaking labour in the gloom of the lower decks; meanwhile, the Rogue Trader's officers and high-ranking servants enjoy the many luxuries the upper decks offer. The flagship's higher-ups receive the best food, clean water, and quality medicine.

languages.text: 下層階級の者にとっては、下層デッキの暗がりで、重労働を強いられるだけの日々だ。一方自由開拓者の士官や高位の従者たちは、上層デッキで様々な贅沢を楽しんでいる。旗艦の上層階級であれば、最高の食事、清潔な水、質の高い医療が受けられる。
languages.original_text: For the underclasses, there is nothing but back-breaking labour in the gloom of the lower decks; meanwhile, the Rogue Trader's officers and high-ranking servants enjoy the many luxuries the upper decks offer. The flagship's higher-ups receive the best food, clean water, and quality medicine.

languages.text: 对底层阶级的民众而言，他们只能窝在阴暗的底层甲板，从事繁重的劳动。相比之下，行商浪人的军官与高阶仆从则可以居住在上层甲板，享受奢华的待遇。旗舰上的高层人士可以享受到最美味的食物、干净的水，以及优质的医疗服务。
languages.original_text: For the underclasses, there is nothing but back-breaking labour in the gloom of the lower decks; meanwhile, the Rogue Trader's officers and high-ranking servants enjoy the many luxuries the upper decks offer. The flagship's higher-ups receive the best food, clean water, and quality medicine.

languages.text: Für die niederen Klassen gibt es nichts als harte Arbeit im Zwielicht der unteren Decks, während die Offiziere und hochrangigen Diener {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} den Luxus der oberen Decks genießen. Die Elite des Flaggschiffs erhält erlesene Speisen, sauberes Wasser und wirksame Medikamente.
languages.original_text: For the underclasses, there is nothing but back-breaking labour in the gloom of the lower decks; meanwhile, the Rogue Trader's officers and high-ranking servants enjoy the many luxuries the upper decks offer. The flagship's higher-ups receive the best food, clean water, and quality medicine.

languages.text: Alors que le bas peuple est condamné à besogner jusqu'à la fin de ses jours dans la pénombre des ponts inférieurs, les officiers du libre-marchand et ses serviteurs de haut rang jouissent des nombreux raffinements que leur offrent les ponts supérieurs. L'élite du vaisseau a accès aux meilleurs aliments, à de l'eau propre et à des soins médicaux de qualité.
languages.original_text: For the underclasses, there is nothing but back-breaking labour in the gloom of the lower decks; meanwhile, the Rogue Trader's officers and high-ranking servants enjoy the many luxuries the upper decks offer. The flagship's higher-ups receive the best food, clean water, and quality medicine.

languages.text: Пока чернь гнет спины в полумраке нижних отсеков, офицеры и высокопоставленные слуги Вольного Торговца пользуются многочисленными благами верхних палуб. Лучшая еда, чистая вода и качественные медикаменты достаются верхушке флагмана.

Alt sınıfların alnında, alt güvertelerin kasvetli loşluğunda canları çıkıncaya dek çalışmak yazılıdır. Bu esnada Hür Tacir'in subayları ve yüksek rütbeli hizmetkârları ise üst güvertelerin sunduğu pek çok lüksün tadını çıkarırlar. Sancak gemisinin üst mercilerinin elinin altında en iyi yiyecekler, temiz su ve kaliteli ilaçlar bulunur.
languages.original_text: For the underclasses, there is nothing but back-breaking labour in the gloom of the lower decks; meanwhile, the Rogue Trader's officers and high-ranking servants enjoy the many luxuries the upper decks offer. The flagship's higher-ups receive the best food, clean water, and quality medicine.
